meanings.definition: Unable to be satisfied or appeased
meanings.sent1: Her insatiableness for knowledge led her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent2: The insatiableness of his hunger made him devour the entire pizza in minutes.
meanings.sent3: His insatiableness for adventure often landed him in trouble.
meanings.sent4: The insatiableness of the flames consumed the entire forest in a matter of hours.
meanings.sent5: The insatiableness of the child's curiosity knew no bounds.

meanings.definition: Greediness or avarice that cannot be fulfilled
meanings.sent1: The insatiableness of his desire for wealth drove him to work day and night.
meanings.sent2: Her insatiableness for power led her to make ruthless decisions.
meanings.sent3: The insatiableness of his sweet tooth made him finish the entire cake in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The insatiableness of his ambition knew no limits.
meanings.sent5: The insatiableness of the collector's passion for rare coins was unmatched.
